item.title: Open Letter to U.S. Ambassador to China Nicholas Burns Regarding Human Rights and Peaceful Protest
item.description: Date sent: December 11, 2023, 21:38 (China Standard Time) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-11-open-letter-to-ambassador-nicholas-burns.pdf On LinkedIn: On X (Twitter): Open letter to @USAmbChina Dear Ambassador Burns, I recently read your statement on International Human Rights Day 2023 with great interest and appreciation, particularly given my own experiences with human rights violations in China. Having endured what could only beâ€¦ pic.twitter.com/VX9rppPIir — Vincent B. Le Corre (@VincentBLeCorre) December 11, 2023 Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-11-open-letter-to-ambassador-nicholas-burns.
